channel.title: Learning on Sometimes we write something:)

item.title: 16 lessons from 16 years
item.description: <img src="/media/hilltop-mountain-sky.jpg" alt="sky" /> I’ve been working in the technology industry for the last 16 years. I’ve learned a lot. I wanted to share the lessons I’ve learned over the past 16 years, I figured one for each year seemed nice. It’s harder to make a short list than a long one and I had to cut out some helpful things, perhaps I’ll follow this up with another one with the things that didn’t make the list.
